Articles.Content:
great forum:-)

great little game and have the mac 0.17 version.

would like some help on finding mods for the mac version :-)

can anyone help

thanks

Hi, welcome to the forums!

You can find most mods in the Addon boards on this forum. They should work equally well for the Mac version.

Cheers
I think all mods are for win/mac, some plugins migth be only for windows tho

You can find the add-ons here red37red, and the plugin powered add-ons are there at the top as a sub page

All the add-ons should work fine, even the plugin powered releases, as the plugin system relies on C#

C# code is handled by .NET on Windows, and by Mono on Mac, so as long as you have Mono installed you should not have any problems
I don't use Mono, or anything and all the plugins and mods work perfectly fine on my Mac.

Good to know Veeltch, thanks for the heads up, I guess Mono/.NET is only needed for the Patcher and for making your own plugins.

I have always installed Mono just in case, never really tested KSP without it.
